page.title: 01BARNTON AND HARTFORD
page.content: The population of{Barnton and {Hartford}has increased greatly in the last hundred years due partly to employment opportunities provided by the local ICI works. ICI provides managerial, clerical and manual jobs. The cleaner air of Barnton and Hartford, and the nearness of open countryside, brought people from heavily industrialised Manchester and Liverpool. Large estates have been built in the past twenty years to accomodate the rising population. Luckily Hartford and Barnton do not suffer as badly as Northwich from subsidence due to salt mining. The{M6}is only ten miles from Hartford. Trains run regularly from Hartford station to Liverpool and Crewe. Even London is within commuting distance.
